siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Guardians is a personal safety app designed to be used with your close family & trusted friends. It starts with location sharing but it’s lot more than that.
blogPost.body: Guardians is a personal safety app designed to be used with your close family & trusted friends. It starts with location sharing but it’s lot more than that.
blogPost.title: Guardians - A safety app for women
blogPost.author: Nakul Kabra

localize.description: Guardians是一款专为你的亲密家人和值得信赖的朋友而设计的个人安全应用。它从位置共享开始，但它的功能远不止于此。
Guardians是一款專爲你的親密家人和值得信賴的朋友而設計的個人安全應用。它從位置共享開始，但它的功能遠不止於此。

previous.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
previous.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals

localize.description: Kintell是一个平台，通过付费和公益视频咨询，将寻求建议的人与有资格提供建议的人联系起来。通过Kintell视频平台，浏览顾问，预订会话，并与他们交谈。
localize.tagline: 经过审核的专业人员提供1对1的视频建议和指导。

localize.description: Kintell是一個平臺，通過付費和公益視頻諮詢，將尋求建議的人與有資格提供建議的人聯繫起來。通過Kintell視頻平臺，瀏覽顧問，預訂會話，並與他們交談。
localize.tagline: 經過審覈的專業人員提供1對1的視頻建議和指導。

next.excerpt: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
next.title: Best10 - 100% personalised workouts, eating plan & a certified coach.

localize.description: Best10为您提供无与伦比的日常支持，让您在家中就能享受到舒适的生活。每天都会收到您的认证教练的检查，100%个性化的锻炼和饮食计划，以及完整的购物清单和食谱。
localize.tagline: 100%个性化的锻炼，饮食计划和认证教练。

localize.description: Best10爲您提供無與倫比的日常支持，讓您在家中就能享受到舒適的生活。每天都會收到您的認證教練的檢查，100%個性化的鍛鍊和飲食計劃，以及完整的購物清單和食譜。
localize.tagline: 100%個性化的鍛鍊，飲食計劃和認證教練。
